function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread in service ecosystems and local communities.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission, outbreaks, and public health concerns.","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous sterilization protocols, enhance safety measures, and promote public health awareness.","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, contactless payment systems, and health monitoring technologies.","People":"Service providers, customers, employees, and local community members.","Owner":"Service providers, local health authorities, and government agencies."}]}
